nodes.beat: Little Red, a young environmentalist, receives a video call from her sick grandmother who lives in a solar-powered house in the forest.
Grandmother asks Little Red to bring her some organic medicines from the local farmer's market.
Little Red, donning her iconic red hoodie, cycles towards the market.
On her way, she encounters a sly businessman who learns about her mission.
The businessman, wanting to promote his synthetic medicines, misguides Little Red to his pharmaceutical company.
Realizing she's been tricked, Little Red uses her knowledge of sustainable living to expose the businessman's harmful practices.
The businessman is reported to the authorities and Little Red continues her journey.
Little Red delivers the organic medicines to her grandmother and they enjoy a meal made from home-grown vegetables.
Grandmother asks Little Red to bring her an eco-friendly gadget from the local sustainable tech-store.
The businessman, wanting to promote his non-eco-friendly gadgets, tries to trick Little Red into buying his products.
Little Red, being knowledgeable about sustainable technology, exposes the businessman's greenwashing tactics.
The businessman is reported to the authorities and Little Red buys the eco-friendly gadget.
Little Red delivers the gadget to her grandmother who uses it to optimize her house's solar energy consumption.
Little Red, a popular eco-blogger, decides to live-stream her visit to her grandmother's solar-powered house.
Little Red's live-stream attracts a cyber-troll who starts spreading false information about organic medicines.
Little Red, noticing the troll's comments, uses her platform to debunk the misinformation.
Her followers report the troll leading to his account being suspended.
Little Red's live-stream attracts a cyber-troll who starts spreading false information about eco-friendly gadgets.
Little Red, noticing the troll's comments, uses her platform to debunk the misinformation.
Grandmother asks Little Red to bring her a rare plant from the local organic nursery.
The businessman, wanting to promote his genetically modified plants, tries to trick Little Red into buying his products.
Little Red, being knowledgeable about native plants, exposes the businessman's harmful practices.
The businessman is reported to the authorities and Little Red buys the rare plant.
Little Red delivers the plant to her grandmother who adds it to her organic garden.
Grandmother asks Little Red to bring her some seeds from the local seed bank.
The businessman, wanting to promote his genetically modified seeds, tries to trick Little Red into buying his products.
Little Red, being knowledgeable about native seeds, exposes the businessman's harmful practices.
The businessman is reported to the authorities and Little Red buys the native seeds.
Little Red delivers the seeds to her grandmother who plants them in her organic garden.
Little Red's live-stream attracts a cyber-troll who starts spreading false information about native plants.
Little Red, noticing the troll's comments, uses her platform to debunk the misinformation.
Little Red's live-stream attracts a cyber-troll who starts spreading false information about native seeds.
Little Red, noticing the troll's comments, uses her platform to debunk the misinformation.
